about_the_game:
"

Motes of the Divine

Have a soft spot for hideous abominations? Enjoy cleaning up after mad scientists? Then slip into your
bodysuit of Haz'Mat
, 'cos this is the 5th edition supplement for you.


In the heart of the Clockwork Arcadia, a colossal machine builds a robotic avatar to unleash upon the planes. Corrupted by a mad biomancer, infused with arcanoficial intelligence, and armed with an alarming lack of scientific ethics, this being has but one purpose: to create. What is it creating? Terrifying crimes against nature; mutant abominations that waste no time in wreaking havoc and destruction upon the innocent. Someone needs to stop the source of these horrors. Are you up to the task?


New Content for 5e



Motes of the Divine is a collection of horror-themed monster hunts for 5E, but that's not all it contains! This supplement brings a hoard of new content to your game:

  • Five horrifying monster hunts  which can link together into the Motes of the Divine storyline, each at three levels of play
    + 1 bonus hunt, Garden of Dark Delights!
  • Fully illustrated handouts for each adventure.
  • Over 70 illustrated magic items, including new recipes for magical meals.
  • 37 new creatures .
  • 21 bizarre spells.
  • 7 gorgeous maps.
  • 6 unique familiars.

What's in the Fantasy Grounds VTT package?


  • Fully implemented
    stat blocks
    and
    tokens
    for every enemy!
  • Battlemap with
    LOS
    , as well as all the
    encounters
    you'll need for each level bracket of the adventure, ready to drop in.
  • Handouts for
    all the spells and items
    in the adventure, as well as the clues, landscapes, sketches, creature and NPC art, and the wanted poster.
  • A fully linked Reference Manual.
"
